lines.text: Stand on your feet, you lyin' buzzard! It's agin my principles to shoot a man sittin' down.
Hey, Sheriff, let us out of here! I wasn't raised to be a convict.
Hey! If you don't stop that racket I'll...
Aw, you'll do what? Throw us in jail, I suppose.

[singing about Mr. Moreland]
Living in the open ought to do him lots of good, for...

[singing]
What do you think we ought to do?

[singing]
Why, he should be a Vaquero!
